name: Pim Pam Duel!
description:
How to play:

You will need one controller for every player, once on the main menu, press start/spacebar to join your  controller.

Press start/spacebar again to disconnect your controller.

Your objective in this game is to fill up your limit bar and take your opponents' three lifes using your executions. To achieve this you will be able to wander through an arena and collect power ups to aid you, But beware! Upon losing a life you will be stripped of all of your power ups and will have to start all over!

Endure ´till the end to achieve a massive victory!

Controls: 

Keyboard: 

WASD  to move
Arrow Keys to aim 
R to use your execution dash
F to shoot
E for melee attack
Space to dash

Controller
Left Stick to move
Right Stick to aim
North Button to use your execution dash
L1 to shoot
East Button for melee attack
X to dash

Ángel "dexaxi" Baeza (@dexaxitu) /Programming/Graphics/
